name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Stanton STORY, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
POMEROY, J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Stanton STORY, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
POMEROY, J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Charles M. Schwartz, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Robert L. Eberhardt, Charles W. Johns, Leo M. Dillon, Asst. Dist. Attys., Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
398 A.2d 630
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Stanton STORY, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 26, 1978.
Decided Dec. 29, 1978.
Charles M. Schwartz, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Robert L. Eberhardt, Charles W. Johns, Leo M. Dillon, Asst. Dist. Attys., Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
